data.text: @kshitijshah23 @ConnorFCB Is the europa league or conference league gonna be the same

@GodynMarcel @Richard_Meakin @kshitijshah23 ohhh so it was OK when teams like Madrid and Barca could afford to pay more than anyone else and were the richest clubs that most other big teams couldnt compete with? but now not OK if other teams do it? The SL just enables the problem to get worse.
@JakeH1886 @Richard_Meakin @kshitijshah23 Nope, Situation like this is the result of the Oil sponsored clubs like P$G or City, look how they destroyed market and everything else

@GodynMarcel @SmithWin2020 @kshitijshah23 you're being so so stupid if you think the SL would be corruption free. It would be even worse because you're letting the richest clubs govern how the competition they want to win runs???
@GodynMarcel @Richard_Meakin @kshitijshah23 lmfao those clubs are run like shit thats why. Oh no boo hoo you might not be the best every single year. Tough shit.

@kshitijshah23 "financial issues all top teams across Europe are facing"

Have you had a look at the lower leagues? The top clubs proved they could play without fans. Lower league clubs have literally fallen apart and some may never recover.
@Craig_Gorrie @kshitijshah23 Super league is happening because of teams like Psg and Newcastle
@iamalvingeorge @kshitijshah23 But no team would play in a domestic league? It’s a ridiculous concept and it’s just more money for fans to have to spend to watch their team play…
